Is it giving the wrong order? Test it out with https://npm.runkit.com/tiny-version-compare

import tinyVersionCompare from "tiny-version-compare";
console.assert(
    tinyVersionCompare('1.0.0-b2', '1.0.0') === -1,
    '-b2 should be lower'
);
